file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Quote API
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: "http://localhost:5000"
paths:
  "/api/customers/{id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - Customers
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
            format: int32
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "customer details"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/CustomerDto"
  "/api/quotes/{id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - Quotes
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 1
      responses:
        "200":
          description: ""
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/QuoteDto"
  /api/quotes:
    post:
      tags:
        - Quotes
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/CreateQuoteCommand"
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: ""
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/CreateQuoteResponse"
    get:
      tags:
        - Quotes
      parameters:
        - name: filter
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
        - name: activeOnly
          in: query
          schema:
            type: boolean
            nullable: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: ""
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/QuoteSummaryDto"

  "/api/quotes/{id}/customer":
    put:
      tags:
        - Quotes
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/UpdateQuoteCustomerCommand"
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "success"
  "/api/quotes/{id}/mobile-phone":
    put:
      tags:
        - Quotes
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/UpdateQuoteMobilePhoneCommand"
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "success"
  "/api/quotes/{id}/accessories":
    post:
      tags:
        - Quotes
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/UpsertQuoteAccessoriesCommand"
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "success"
  "/api/quotes/{id}/note":
    put:
      tags:
        - Quotes
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 1
      requestBody:
        x-name: dto
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/UpdateQuoteNoteCommand"
        required: true
        x-position: 2
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "success"
  "/api/quotes/{id}/accept":
    post:
      tags:
        - Quotes
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 1
      requestBody:
        x-name: dto
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/AcceptQuoteCommand"
        required: true
        x-position: 2
      responses:
        "200":
          description: "success"
  /sign-in:
    get:
      tags:
        - Security
      parameters:
        - name: returnUrl
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 1
      responses:
        "200":
          description: ""
  /sign-out:
    get:
      tags:
        - Security
      responses:
        "200":
          description: ""
  /api/users/me:
    get:
      tags:
        - Users
      responses:
        "200":
          description: ""
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/UserProfileDto"
components:
  schemas:
    CustomerDto:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        address:
          type: string
        phone:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        email:
          type: string
      required:
        - name
        - address
        - email
    QuoteDto:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
        quoteNumber:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        statusCode:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/QuoteStatusCode"
        lastModifiedAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        customer:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/CustomerDto"
        mobilePhone:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/QuoteMobilePhoneDto"
        accessories:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/QuoteAccessoryDto"
        note:
          type: string
          nullable: true
      required:
        - id
        - statusCode
        - lastModifiedAt
        - customer
    QuoteStatusCode:
      type: string
      description: ""
      enum:
        - Draft
        - Open
        - Accepted
        - Expired
    QuoteMobilePhoneDto:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        serialNo:
          type: string
        model:
          type: string
        price:
          type: number
          format: decimal
        discount:
          type: number
          format: decimal
          nullable: true
      required:
        - serialNo
        - model
        - price
    QuoteAccessoryDto:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        description:
          type: string
        quantity:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        unitPrice:
          type: number
          format: decimal
      required:
        - id
        - description
        - quantity
        - unitPrice
    CreateQuoteResponse:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
      required:
        - id
    CreateQuoteCommand:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        customerName:
          type: string
        customerAddress:
          type: string
        customerPhone:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        customerEmail:
          type: string
      required:
        - customerName
        - customerAddress
        - customerEmail
    UpdateQuoteCustomerCommand:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        quoteId:
          type: string
        customerName:
          type: string
        customerAddress:
          type: string
        customerPhone:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        customerEmail:
          type: string
      required:
        - quoteId
        - customerName
        - customerEmail
        - customerAddress
    UpdateQuoteMobilePhoneCommand:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        quoteId:
          type: string
        serialNo:
          type: string
        model:
          type: string
        price:
          type: number
          format: decimal
        discount:
          type: number
          format: decimal
          nullable: true
      required:
        - quoteId
        - serialNo
        - model
        - price

    QuoteSummaryDto:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
        quoteNumber:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        statusCode:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/QuoteStatusCode"
        lastModifiedAt:
          type: string
          format: date-time
        customerName:
          type: string
        mobilePhoneDescription:
          type: string
      required:
        - id
        - statusCode
        - lastModifiedAt
        - customerName
        - customerAddress
    UpsertQuoteAccessoriesCommand:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        quoteId:
          type: string
        accessories:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/QuoteAccessoryDto"
      required:
        - quoteId
    UpdateQuoteNoteCommand:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        quoteId:
          type: string
        note:
          type: string
          nullable: true
      required:
        - quoteId
    AcceptQuoteCommand:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        quoteId:
          type: string
      required:
        - quoteId
    UserProfileDto:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        userPictureUrl:
          type: string
          nullable: true
      required:
        - id
        - name
        - userPictureUrl
